headline: Now Streaming: Judge may consider blocking Paramount-Skydance deal
summary: “Now Streaming” is The Fly’s weekly recap of the stories surrounding the biggest content streamers. PLAYING THIS WEEKEND: Among this week’s most notable new streaming content is season one of Marvel Comics series “Daredevil: Born Again,” whose first two episodes are available to watch on Disney+ (DIS).
